extracted_playbook.title: Review WIBU-SYSTEMS Advisory
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to the official WIBU-SYSTEMS Advisory WIBU-210910-01 for detailed information on risk mitigation and impact of the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update WIBU-SYSTEMS Codemeter
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest available stand-alone WIBU-SYSTEMS Codemeter version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable 'Mass Storage' Container Type in CodeMeter
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the container type 'Mass Storage' in CodeMeter via the Windows Registry as a mitigation measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Update e!COCKPIT to Version 1.11
extracted_playbook.description: Install the updated e!COCKPIT setup routines (Version 1.11) with the latest WIBU-SYSTEMS Codemeter version when available.

extracted_playbook.title: Update WAGO-I/O-Pro (CODESYS 2.3) to Version 2.3.9.68
extracted_playbook.description: Install the updated WAGO-I/O-Pro (CODESYS 2.3) setup routines (Version 2.3.9.68) with the latest WIBU-SYSTEMS Codemeter version when available.

affected_products: WAGO e!COCKPIT engineering software installation bundle, < V1.11
